prerequisites.supportedUseCase: Shows various counts of both admin and non-admin users, third-party OAuth tokens and non-active super-admins. Additional widgets allow for Chrome version insight as well as notification of outdated/vulnerable versions of Chrome (adjust query as-needed).

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND google_user WITH active=true AS a 
RETURN COUNT(a) AS value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND google_user with admin=true and active=false AS a 
RETURN COUNT(a) AS value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND google_user WITH admin=true AND active=true AS a 
RETURN COUNT(a) AS value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND google_user WITH admin=true AS a
RETURN COUNT(a) AS value

widgets.title: Workspace Users in my Organization That Have Issued an OAuth Token With a Risky Scope to a 3rd Party Application

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find google_user as user THAT ASSIGNED google_token with
  scopes^=(
    "https://mail.google.com" OR
    "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail." OR
    "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive" OR
    "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/ediscovery" OR
    "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/admin."
  )
  return
    user.email as Email,
    user.name as Name,
    google_token.name as "Google Token",
    google_token.scopes as "Google Scope"

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FINd google_user AS a
RETURN count(a) AS value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND google_user with admin=true and active=false as a
RETURN 
a.displayName as "Display Name",
a.active as Active,
a.admin as Admin,
a.firstName as "First Name",
a.lastName as "Last Name",
a.email as Email

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND google_user with admin=true and active=false and isAdmon=true AS a 
RETURN COUNT(a) AS value

widgets.title: Google Workspace Users With MFA Not Enabled

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND employee 
THAT IS google_user with mfaEnabled != true
RETURN
  google_user.displayName,
  google_user.email,
  google_user.admin,
  google_user.mfaEnabled,
  google_user.lastLoginOn,
  google_user._createdOn

widgets.title: Google Chrome Users Not Using Version NumberÂ 93.0.4577.82 (Edit Version Number As-Needed For Desired Baseline)

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Person as person
THAT OWNS Device
(THAT (MANAGES|MONITORS) HostAgent)?
THAT (IDENTIFIED|INSTALLED) as i Application as app
WHERE 
  app.name ~= ('Chrome' or 'Chromium') AND
  i.version != "93.0.4577.82"
RETURN 
  person.displayName,
  person.email,
  i.version as chromeVersion

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Person as person
THAT OWNS Device
(THAT (MANAGES|MONITORS) HostAgent)?
THAT (IDENTIFIED|INSTALLED) as i Application as app
WHERE 
  app.name ~= ('Chrome' or 'Chromium') 
RETURN 
  i.version as name,
  count(i) AS value
